message:
Hello everyone! Hope you're doing well..
Kindly answer this public questions for all of us:

What's your preferred way to know, follow & read the newest technologies?
What's your best references?
What do you do when start your adventure with any new tech?

Let us make this post for discussing these very important issues and i think it's very target for a many of us or at least for beginners, We always talking and discussing technically than any other ways. So lets try this...

data.message: I am following https://news.ycombinator.com/ , And for learning something new starting with google and ends in SOF or Quora if thay had tag for that thing.

To follow news: I listen to Podcasts (can list them in a separate post), I listen to them while commuting (fel microbus aw fel metro, that is why I hate to drive). Many podcasters summarize what happened in the last month in Javascript or news from Google, etc.
For learning I use Pluralsight, then books, then blog posts.

I follow Dzone and infoQ specially the Java Zone. 
For python and NoSql I am subscribed to Python Weekly and NoSql Weekly. 
http://www.pythonweekly.com/ 
http://www.nosqlweekly.com/
